description: Project scaffold, status file, and packaging metadata exist
Orchestrator and dual-agent execution loop are implemented
CLI supports init, status, iterate, and add-feature flows
Local HTTP service exposes health, status, and iterate APIs
Smoke tests cover initialization and one full iteration
Zero-ask policy is persisted and applied to all agent roles
Quality gate prevents context rot before each iteration
Parallel team iteration coexists with role-based execution flow
Project can run continuous iteration loop with explicit stop decisions
System can launch browser validation and verify web flows automatically
Paper-backed design mapping is documented for loop, stop, and browser validation
Auto handoff snapshot is triggered on context/no-progress thresholds
OSWorld-style action runner supports playwright/desktop/http backends
